text: It's an easy and accessible park connector if you wish to do something active with kids. It was around 8km from Punggol Park to Punggol Jetty , and we rented bicycles from  Gocycling. Toilets and water points available enroute.
Generally pleasant. Just be aware of speeding ebikes and bicycles
Beginning of the PCN serangoon. A long narrow stretch behind condos and homes. Pleasant for walking.
Lived in Serangoon for a good few months before discovering this opening to the PCN!
